name: ENCOMPASS HEALTH CORP
footnote: Our consolidated assets as of December 31, 2017 and December 31, 2016 include total assets of variable interest entities of $264.1 million and $262.3 million, respectively, which cannot be used by us to settle the obligations of other entities. See Note 3, Variable Interest Entities.
